mapper.select: select * from springBoard where title like CONCAT ('%',#{word},'%') limit #{limitIndex},5
select count(*) from springBoard where title like CONCAT ('%',#{word},'%') limit #{limitIndex},5
mapper.insert: insert into springBoard(title, id, text) values(#{title}, #{id}, #{text})
mapper.update: update springBoard set title=#{title}, id=#{id}, text=#{text} where no=#{no}
